dev-1.x.name: drupal/solr_pre_segment

security-coverage.message: Dev releases are not covered by Drupal security advisories.

dev-1.x.description: Chinese, Japanese and Korean words are not separated by space. If we can invoke Solr (with CJK word-segmentation tools configured) to pre-segment the search keywords, and then re-invoke the Solr to search the segmented words, the search result will be much better. This module applies to this situation.

1.0.0.name: drupal/solr_pre_segment

security-coverage.message: Covered by Drupal's security advisory policy

1.0.0.description: Chinese, Japanese and Korean words are not separated by space. If we can invoke Solr (with CJK word-segmentation tools configured) to pre-segment the search keywords, and then re-invoke the Solr to search the segmented words, the search result will be much better. This module applies to this situation.
